snippet: Michael Albasini sprinted to his third Tour of Romandie stage win in his native Switzerland, holding off Thomas Voeckler of France.
abstract: Michael Albasini sprints to his third Tour of Romandie stage win in his native Switzerland; Simon Spilak of Slovakia retains his overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Michael Albasini sprinted to his third Tour of Romandie stage win in his native Switzerland, holding off Thomas Voeckler of France.

headline.print_headline: Win at Home for a Swiss
